newsitem.title: NORWAY: Saga, Total submit joint bid for Irish acreage.
newsitem.headline: Saga, Total submit joint bid for Irish acreage.

text.p: Saga Petroleum ASA said on Monday it had jointly submitted with Total of France an application for acreage in Ireland's Rockall Trough licensing round as part of their Atlantic Margin collaboration.
Saga and Total signed a wide-ranging agreement earlier this year for collaboration in the deepwater Atlantic Margin.
"This is a deepwater round, so it is natural for us to cooperate with Total," Saga's newsletter quoted Torstein Sanness, vice president for international operations, as saying.

"The French company is already an operator off Ireland. We feel a joint application puts us in a stronger position when the Irish authorities award operatorships and licences in the first week of June."
Sanness declined to specify the blocks covered by the application.
